text: maha parakramabahu :kri.wa. 1153 - 1186- nishshankamalla rajathuma kalaniye wardhanayata katayuthu kalaha.

jiwana bara wadiwima, warthamana aanduwe dushitha palanaya ,deshapalana washayen kerena charitha ghathana saha pathalaya hisa esawimata wiruddhawa, mema pol gasima siduwiya.ema awasthawe di ehi pawathi warsha thaththwaya da salakillata nogath pamini pirisa palamuwa wirodhatha puwaru pradarshanaya karamin dewalaya idiripita randi siti athara pasuwa mal pahan puja kirima sidu karana ladi.

lahiru thirimanna ada dinaye indiya pandu yawannan idiriye asarthaka wu athara hitapu nayaka anjelo mathiwus saha yowun ka්ridaka niroshan dikwalla manawin sanwara inimak ka්rida karamin sha්ri lankawa jayaga්rahanaya wetha rugena giya.
emenma ehi bhayankaraya ganada owuhu dana sitiyaha.
me thathwaya hamuwe watath niyarath goyam kana mohothaka sadharanathwayak balaporeththuwiya hakida yanna prashnayaki.
ada thamayi gayiya masa ganak thisse tok karapu, thamange hadawathin ((dan wena eewa baluwama dan uuta ehema ekak na wage)) eeka parshawikawa law karapu bawa ee dariwita kiyanda yanne.....

prawruththiya pala kalath pinthura deka labune natha.
katawahagena innawako ooyi.
ee kiyanne gaskolan pawa nathi wela yanawa.

ekak grama nama.
api kalpana kare.

kiri­wa­lata the, kopi, kokowa saha sini ek kara panaya kirime purudda rasaya pili­banda kara­na­yak wana namuth, widya­gnya­yan pawa­sanne the, kopi, koko­wa­wa­lata ek karana kiri saha sini mangin, eki swabha­wika pana warga­wa­lin apage saukhya­yata labena siyalu prathi­labha sampu­rna­yenma nishe­dha­naya kala haki bawayi.

ee anuwa loka bankuwa, wenath sanwardhanaya wemin pawathina ratawalata mema rakshana kramawedaya hadunwala denna piyawara gena thibenawa.
ee aagamika nayakayange, pradeshaye deshapalakayange, polis niladharinge ha thunsiyayakata aasanna janathawakage sahabhagithwayeni.

wanathawilluwa rajaye idam hora oppu mangin alewi kirime jawarame niyuthuwa siti ‘idam sakwiththa’ laksha 20ka mulya wanchawak sambandhawa eeye (29) dahawal kolambaa wancha wimarshana anshaya mangin athadanguwata gena thibe.sakakaru mita pera dewathawak idam wanchawak sambandhawa puththalama polisiya saha janadhipathi wishesha wimarshana eekakaya mangin athadanguwata gena apa pita sitiyadi ohu mese wancha wimarshana anshayata kotuwi thibe.
eejipthu pannaye boho samakalina ‘muhunu poth aragala’ asarthaka wanne aragalayata pasu thathwaya pilibadawa salasumak nathi nisawen bawa jijak pawasanne me nisaya.
menna meka thama kiyanne nidahas adahas prakasha kirime ayithiya naha kiyala.
ejapaye chanda pa්ramanaya, chandaya pa්rakasha kala janayagen siyayata 50kata wadi pa්ramanayaka sita siyayata 29 dakwa soda palu wi atha.
ee methek kolambas dinaya lesa salakunu okthobar masaye dewana sanduda dinaya min idiriyata swadeshika janayage dinaya lesa samarannatayi.

gangana thakshanayata ha injineru wishayayata sambandha patamala sahitha usas adhyapana aayathanayak mahanuwara pradeshaye idikirimata da niyamithaya.manipal wishwawidyalaye shakhawak merata sthapitha kirima sambandhayen indiyanu rajaya saha manipal wishwawidyalaye palanadhikariya samanga sakachcha kara awashya katayuthu siyalla me wana wita nima kara athayi usas adhyapana amathi es. bi. disanayaka mahatha prakasha karayi.indiyawe manipal wishwawidyalayen waidya upadhiya hadarimata meratin sisun boho deneku indiyawata yana bawath ee ek sisuwakuta rupiyal laksha 350k waya wana bawath amathiwaraya pawasayi.ema wishwawidyalaye shakhawa merata pihituwimen pasu indiyawata nogos rupiyal laksha 100k pamanak waya kara merata dima waidya upadhiya laba ganimata sisunta awasthawa himi weyi..

wika්ramasinha siya sahithya jiwithaya aarambha kale lila(1914) nawakathawa saha sahithya wichara lipi sanga්rahayak wu shasthi්raya lekhana (1919) yana kruthin elidakwamini.

ihala yana sahal mila palanaya kirima sandaha mol himiyan sathuwa nadu wi thoga nathayi pawasu dadli sirisena mahatha, eheyin rajaya rate janathawa gana sitha sahal widesha ratawalin genawith ho mila palanaya kala yuthu bawa sandahan kaleya.
namuth api thama katha ෙnakala pathith thiyenawa.

piya wisin surakshitha kara thaba gath mulma kerala chithrapataye pitapatha lama wiye di thama athin dawi alu wa giya wagaya.chithrapataya aarambha wanuye da lamayeku wisin chithrapatayaka pitapathak ada dama eyata gini thabimeni.ohu wisin winasa kara damana ladde mulma kerala chithrapataya bawa ohu wataha ganne pasu kalakaya.wigatha kumaran chithrapataya pilibanda heli karana karunu athulatha ape sinamawe da wadagath karunak athulath weyi.enam ehi darshana kerala chithragarayen pasu rupa gatha karana ladade kolambaa nagaraye bawaya.eya ape sinamawe ithihasagnyayange awadhanaya yomu wiya yuthu karunaki.indiyanu sinamawa ada balu balmata surabi denaka bawa hanguna da ehi purogamin eya goda naguwe indiyawe sampradayan ha gatemin bawa boho dena nodanithi.seliyuloyid me ithihasaya kadimata wiwarana karayi.mema chithrapataye daniyel lesa charitha nirupanaya karanuye warthamanaye malayalam sinamawe janapriya naluwaku wana prithwi raj wisini.indiyanu sinama ulele mewara indiyanu panoramawata tharagakari anshayen chithrapata 26 k athulath wu athara ema anshaye wenuwen wayambaa diga indiyanu sinama anshayata chithrapata 18 k da siyawasaka indiyanu sangitha anshayata chithrapata 30 k da palke sammana dinu chithrapata karuwan ge chithrapata1 2k da washayen chithrapata 200 kata aasanna sankhyawak thira gatha kerina.mathu sambandhayi aruna gunarathna
